objects.text:
• Space-Saving Compact Design
• Multiple Drying Cycles
• Energy-Efficient Operation
• Digital LED Display

product_details.name: Insignia Modern High-Efficiency Compact Clothes Dryer - Sleek White Design
product_details.description:
• Digital LED Display with Clear Time & Cycle Indicators
• Multiple Drying Cycles Including My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty & Towels
• Space-Saving Compact Design Perfect for Apartments & Small Spaces
• Easy-to-Use Control Dial with Multiple Temperature Settings
• Contemporary White Finish with Large Dark Glass Door
• Built-in Ventilation System for Efficient Drying
• Convenient Maintenance Access Panel
• Energy-Efficient Operation for Lower Utility Bills
• Clear Digital Interface with Simple Program Selection
• Durable Construction with Modern Aesthetic
• Front-Loading Design with Easy Access Door
• Professional-Grade Drying Performance in a Home Format

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, bold layout designed to promote a compact dryer. The background uses layered diagonal shapes in deep navy and steel blue tones, enhanced by geometric accents like translucent lines, circles, and bars, adding a modern, tech-inspired feel. The focal point is a prominent product image ("product_image") on the right half of the design. 

Text elements include a large, bold headline ("heading") in white, followed by a vibrant electric blue subheading ("subheading"). Key product features are listed in a clear white bullet format ("description"). A stylish italic tagline ("tagline") complements the theme, and the bold price ("price") grabs attention. A bright call-to-action button ("cta_button") with contrasting text ("cta") at the bottom invites users to act.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy: #1A3A5E
- Ocean Blue: #0D2C4D
- Steel Blue: #2C4F75
- Electric Blue: #60B6FF
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a modern and minimalist aesthetic dominated by a clean white body (#FFFFFF), which conveys hygiene, simplicity, and elegance. The door and display panel use deep black (#1C1C1C) and charcoal gray (#2F2F2F), adding contrast and a sleek visual appeal. The control knob is highlighted with metallic silver (#C0C0C0), surrounded by subtle accent colors like light blue (#7FC6E9), orange-red (#F15B40), and pale gray (#D3D3D3), which highlight different cycle options without overwhelming the design. These colors blend harmoniously by maintaining light tones with minimal saturation, enhancing functionality while keeping the design modern and clean—ideal for a technology-focused advertisement banner.
